events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role from Jane Doe and it has been logged in our system for review.
Jane Doe's application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department based on her software development experience.
Recruiter Mark Smith has been assigned to manage Jane Doe's candidate journey for the software engineering position.
Completed initial phone screening with Jane Doe; she demonstrated strong fundamentals in software development and problem-solving skills.
Jane Doe responded promptly, expressing keen interest in our engineering role and eagerness to move forward with technical interviews.
Technical coding interview has been scheduled with Jane Doe for May 5th at 10:00 AM UTC via video call.
Jane Doe successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating excellent knowledge in algorithms, data structures, and system design.
HR interview scheduled for Jane Doe on May 8th at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss culture fit, benefits, and company policies.
Jane Doe completed HR interview, showing alignment with company values and enthusiasm towards the role and team environment.
Formal offer for the Software Engineer position sent to Jane Doe, including competitive salary and benefits package.
Jane Doe provided positive feedback on the interview process and expressed excitement about the offer and future opportunities.
Jane Doe accepted the offer for the Software Engineer role and agreed to start onboarding as scheduled.
Jane Doe has officially started the onboarding process and has been provided access to internal systems and resources.
Recruitment process completed successfully; Jane Doe fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
